issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting pre-existing conditions, and lowering prescription drug costs

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocates for major infrastructure spending to create jobs and modernize transportation and technology systems

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal principles, clean energy investments, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Gun Safety Legislation
issues.description: Supports universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and enhanced gun control measures

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship and border security

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and community college support

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Supports increased VA funding, mental health services for veterans, and job training programs
